notes.text: We now show a generic message when the item deletion fails in various scenarios
We no longer request data for actions of hidden subsections
We now support Core.AlternateKeys to allow app developers to force the fetching of alternate properties when loading an object page
We now allow overflowing of object page header buttons in small screens
We've now provided a detailed description of the setAsSectionTitleOwner ExtensionAPI
We've resolved an issue that prevented the Delete button from triggering any deletion from an object page without a header's title
We've resolved an issue where fields were not shown if a maximum annotation or a minimum annotation was used but no date annotation was used in validation
The message strip of the list report is now recreated when the list report is reopened after going to the home page
